<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader">BinaryStreamReader</a> &amp;Reader) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC = <a href="#ae26f9a8ac2ab2c64e019e7bf0db493b5">checkHashHdrVersion</a>(HashHdr))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Before the actual hash buckets, there is a bitmap of length determined by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IPHR&#95;HASH.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitmapSizeInBits = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#af346f133e1c69ecb36169234b44253fca4e013a87e7ede585d1aa379f94c585e4">IPHR&#95;HASH</a> + 1, 32);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t NumBitmapEntries = BitmapSizeInBits / 32;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC = Reader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#ab88a8b3835c1028f8fd6c2b23f396d30">readArray</a>(HashBitmap, NumBitmapEntries))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a71210b99d2ef87236d8505c1771a7ab1">joinErrors</a>(std::move(EC),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">                      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">make&#95;error&lt;RawError&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a573bcbbea76b4d72b33de1e392cc14aea8c4fdeb9f0256322a364cd1347a6ffd6">raw&#95;error&#95;code::corrupt&#95;file</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Could not read a bitmap.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t CompressedBucketIdx = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#af346f133e1c69ecb36169234b44253fca4e013a87e7ede585d1aa379f94c585e4">IPHR&#95;HASH</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint8&#95;t WordIdx = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> / 32;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint8&#95;t BitIdx = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> % 32;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsSet = HashBitmap&#91;WordIdx&#93; &amp; (1U &lt;&lt; BitIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsSet) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">      BucketMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = CompressedBucketIdx++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">      BucketMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t NumBuckets = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> : HashBitmap)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumBuckets += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0eea77e7bfa82e0219d2ec7b4efbc94f">llvm::popcount</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Hash buckets follow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC = Reader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#ab88a8b3835c1028f8fd6c2b23f396d30">readArray</a>(HashBuckets, NumBuckets))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Hash buckets corrupted.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/gsihashtable/#a1c16e5706517a32b6050effc1cd6a7c6"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/gsihashtable/#a1c16e5706517a32b6050effc1cd6a7c6">GSIHashTable::read</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader">BinaryStreamReader</a> &amp;Reader) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC = <a href="#a5ae02ec2318ccbef9898227128b7320f">readGSIHashRecords</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/gsihashtable/#af2cc607471bf2a0974cc66f6c69ae330">HashRecords</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/gsihashtable/#a14bf1334c8b6973b2c4dae47878f7b28">HashHdr</a>, Reader))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/gsihashtable/#a14bf1334c8b6973b2c4dae47878f7b28">HashHdr</a>-&gt;HrSize &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC = <a href="#a47db0d3530f3a43617019d711cbae24f">readGSIHashBuckets</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/gsihashtable/#a31fbdd144275728c043df0953a8ae4a3">HashBuckets</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/gsihashtable/#a53cf7c9e12a11534af19c93f9310146f">HashBitmap</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/gsihashtable/#a14bf1334c8b6973b2c4dae47878f7b28">HashHdr</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/gsihashtable/#a303e48b9a7471a93d1969af93dd27f2a">BucketMap</a>, Reader))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
